data.title: Z list of 783 Universities in Japan
data.meta_description: Explore a comprehensive alphabetical list [A-Z] of 783 officially recognized Japanese Universities and Colleges in 2024.
data.text:
How is a specific Japanese University or College ranked and where is it located in Japan according to uniRank? uniRank answers this question by publishing a comprehensive alphabetical list of 783 Japanese higher-education institutions meeting the following uniRank selection criteria:

being chartered, licensed or accredited by the appropriate Japanese higher education-related organization.

offering at least three-year bachelor's degrees or postgraduate master's or doctoral degrees

delivering courses predominantly in a traditional, non-distance education format

With this webpage, uniRank aims to provide a complete listing, sorted by alphabetical order from A to Z, of all Japanese Universities and Colleges with their ranking and location.
